wikiData.title: Rucho v. Common Cause
wikiData.FullName: Robert A. Rucho et al. v. Common Cause et al.
wikiData.Prior: Motion to dismiss denied, ''Common Cause v. Rucho'', 240 [[F. Supp. 3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infdco20170306a99 376] ([[M.D.N.C.]] 2017); redistricting plan held unconstitutional, 279 F. Supp. 3d [https://www.leagle.com/decision/279181739fsupp3d58745 587] (M.D.N.C. 2018); stay denied, 284 F. Supp. 3d [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infdco20180117a79 780] (M.D.N.C. 2018); vacated and remanded in light of ''[[Gill v. Whitford]]'', 138 S. Ct. 2679 (2018); judgment entered on remand, 318 F. Supp. 3d [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infdco20180828d15 777] (M.D.N.C. 2018).
